# UITabBarItemAppearance.Style.stacked

**Case**

A vertically stacked icon and title.

## Declaration

```swift
case stacked
```

## Item layout

- **UITabBarItemAppearance.Style.inline**: A side-by-side layout of the icon and title, suitable for use in regular-width environments.
- **UITabBarItemAppearance.Style.compactInline**: A side-by-side layout of the icon and title, suitable for use in compact-width environments.

items.description: A side-by-side layout of the icon and title, suitable for use in regular-width environments.
items.name: UITabBarItemAppearance.Style.inline

items.description: A side-by-side layout of the icon and title, suitable for use in compact-width environments.
items.name: UITabBarItemAppearance.Style.compactInline
